content: Epyc Courier Service is Los Angeles' HIPAA-compliant medical courier partner. We serve hospitals, clinical laboratories, pharmacies, urgent care facilities, and physician offices across LA County. Our team maintains strict chain of custody protocols, temperature-controlled transport, and real-time tracking on every delivery. When specimen integrity matters, Epyc delivers. 98.7% on-time. Every time.

Your specimens deserve better than a generic delivery service. HIPAA-compliant. Temperature-controlled. Chain of custody documented. 98.7% on-time. Serving LA County hospitals, labs, and pharmacies. Epyc Courier Service — Precision Delivery. Every Time. 818-217-0070

The hidden cost of unreliable medical deliveries: A single compromised specimen means: → Patient callback and recollection → Delayed diagnosis and treatment → Staff time managing exceptions → Regulatory exposure from broken chain of custody → Damaged provider relationships. At Epyc Courier Service, we eliminate these risks with HIPAA-compliant protocols, temperature monitoring, and documented chain of custody on every pickup. Los Angeles labs and pharmacies trust us because our 98.7% on-time rate is not a marketing claim — it is an operational standard.
